reviews.review: ITs fun and good game to play with freinds
You dont own steam and not give csgo a try, so give it a try

its a good game to play in between newer competitive games when you get bored of an old one, however its easy to get frustrated at. 
Its a good game, but i swear to GOD do NOT play competitive unless you have a mic. It ruins the experience for your teamates.
Perrisimo, un FPS para pasar el rato

Mano, seguinte, se você quiser passar raiva pra caralho jogando  eu recomendo! Mesmo comprando o passe (CS:GO Prime) vc cai em partidas com hackers pra caralho além de ter jogadores cancerígenos filhos da pulta zuando nas partidas.. Esse jogo só presta se você for jogar na Faceit ou jogar na GamersClub, caso contrário, você vai passar muita raiva no Mating Making (MM).

Игра сама по себе хорошая, можно со всеми очень весело провести время. Одно что не нравятся что в последнее время развелось очень много читеров, которые любят вконце катки подключать софт. Надеюсь что жалобы на них как то помогут!
Really good game. The only problem is the gigantic amount of cheaters, and the really bad anti cheat system used. Valve Anti-Cheat (AKA VAC) SUCKS TREMENDOUSLY!!!!!
its a nice game but hard to play for a new fps player.... but a little practice it will become easier
